name: Tappy Counter Mind-level Training
description:
A very simple brain puzzle game to play, and stay active. Do you feel dull all day and want to have some interesting activity to keep your brain and nerves working, then Real Tap Count Puzzle Game, 60 Seconds Brainstorm is the perfect game for you to have fun and interesting gameplay at the same time. This is a time lapse based game in which you are required to take in account the numbers given.

The easy and intuitive GUI of this game will not let you get anywhere distracted. This Real Tap Count Puzzle Game, 60 Seconds Brainstorm game has the complete power to attract the player towards it. There are some simple rules and regulations to play this game. This is the perfect game to test your mind and intelligence and eye catching ability to detect and select the numbers in time and with accuracy. Would you be able to test your abilities of selecting numbers. Real Tap Count Puzzle Game, 60 Seconds Brainstorm game has some simple rules, you are given a fixed amount of time, in which there is a specific task given and you have to complete that task within the limited time given, for each quick move, you will be given some extra seconds to play the game and finish task with extra time.

Easy GUI will help you play this intuitive game with the task listed on the side bar, you have given the task to select the number from the board as given on the side, correct selection will give you extra points and wrong number selection will deduct your points as ell will reduce your life-line to play this game. The position of button is changing randomly. A bonus button is displayed in game window. When you click on that button, you can get 5 sec extra time. You can get 5 score, for every right click on the button. On a miss or wrong tap one point will be deducted.

Real Tap Count Puzzle Game, 60 Seconds Brainstorm key features:

Best co-ordination of hands, mind and eye required
Quick response will lead to extra scores
Quick and fast responsive game
Easy to understand GUI
Simple puzzle based games
Free to play and install

Download Real Tap Count Puzzle Game, 60 Seconds Brainstorm to test your mind, eyes and hands co-ordination all at once. Have fun to play this puzzle game, of new 2017 free games lot.
